structure.unit: DIVISION 2. CIVIL SERVICE FOR COUNTY EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Records of Department to be public.

text.section:
Sec. 2-48. Records of Department to be public.
The records of the Personnel Department, except such records as the rules may properly require to be held confidential for reasons of public policy, shall be public records and shall be open to public inspection, subject to reasonable regulations as to the time and manner of inspection which may be prescribed by the Director.
